title: Login Issue
description: Customer unable to log in with correct credentials.

title: Payment Failure
description: Payment gateway shows error code 502 during checkout.

title: Slow Loading Dashboard
description: Dashboard takes more than 15 seconds to load.

title: Password Reset Not Working
description: Password reset email is not being sent to the user.

title: App Crash on iOS
description: App crashes immediately after launch on iOS 18 devices.

title: Incorrect Invoice
description: Customer received an invoice with wrong billing details.

title: Feature Request: Dark Mode
description: Customer requested a dark mode option for the dashboard.

title: Email Notifications Delayed
description: System emails are delayed by up to 2 hours.

title: Data Sync Error
description: User data not syncing across devices.

title: Broken Link on Help Page
description: FAQ link on help page redirects to a 404 page.
